name: Blocky Odyssey | Space Ship Exploration Trek (Free Game)
name_original: Blocky Odyssey | Space Ship Exploration Trek (Free Game)
description:
Travel through the stars in this war of spaceships!

Choose your spaceship and fly at full speed through space in this intergalactic war Beware of laser shots enemies can destroy your spaceship!

The trek will not be easy, but great rewards await you if you get to win this galactic war. Fight for the stars!

• Realistic spaceships
• Film atmosphere
• Great special sound effects
• Fleet of spaceships to choose
• Realistic star battle

Come on pilots, you have a battle to win, the stars are waiting for you!

Twitter: @LabCave
Facebook: www.facebook.com/LabCaveGames
